mapper.insert: insert into user(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select ifnull((select 1 from user where EMAIL = #{email} limit 1), 0)
mapper.update: update user set NICKNAME=#{nickName}, MAJOR = #{major}, AGE = #{age}, SEX = #{sex}, HEAD_URL = #{headUrl} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select HEAD_URL from user where ID = #{id} limit 1
